subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Playing on the manicured minefield at T.P.C. Sawgrass in the second round of the Players Championship, David Toms birdied six holes and bogeyed two for a tidy round of 68.
snippet: Playing on the manicured minefield at T.P.C. Sawgrass in the second round of the Players Championship, David Toms birdied six holes and bogeyed two for a tidy round of 68.
